name: wp-vincod-plugin
description: The « Vincod for WordPress » plugin allows you to instantly create a « Our Wines » section in your WordPress website.
author: Vinternet

scripts.build: npm install && bower install && gulp dist
scripts.clean: rm -r node_modules; rm -r assets/bower_components; rm -r assets/css; rm assets/js/vendor.js
scripts.init: npm install && bower install && gulp build
scripts.refresh: npm run clean; npm run init
scripts.dist: npm run clean; npm run build
